link.title: East Bernstadt Elementary School - News

form.name: aspnetForm

span.p: Based on the recommendation by Gov. Beshear to discontinue in-house school activities, THERE WILL BE NO ON-CAMPUS ACTIVITIES FOR EBIS FROM MAR. 16th THRU MAY 1st. Instruction during this time will consist of non-traditional instruction (NTI) days. The week of March 30-April 3 is scheduled as Spring Break for the district. EBIS' REGULARLY SCHEDULED CLASSES WILL NOT RESUME UNTIL AFTER May 1, 2020. Please see the notice in the News Feed below for additional information and instruction.

NEW and Important Meal Service Information

span.span: We have some important announcements regarding future meal services. Starting Friday, April 10th we are switching to a two day week meal service. Meals will be picked up and delivered on Fridays and Tuesdays. When you pick up breakfast and lunch meals on Fridays, you will be receiving meals for Monday as well. Meal deliveries will also include meals for Monday. We will resume meal pick up and delivery on Tuesdays where you will be receiving meals for Tuesday, Wednesday and Thursday. To clarify, we will only have pickup and delivery on Tuesdays and Fridays, but you will still receive meals for the entire week. If you have any questions regarding meal services, please contact the school.

see our school nurse through telehealth

span.span: Family Health Care Tele-Health program is in full swing! If you're at home feeling ill, don't worry about driving out to see us. Call, text, or FB message Crystal Thomas for a visit today! Now seeing patients!! You can contact them at (859) 474-1196 and ask for Heather Hammack or Crystal Thomas! They can help students, families, and anyone in the community.
They are happy to answer your questions and assist to the best of their ability!
